sentences.sContent: This obviously is the limiting case of the idealized monochromatic wave .
sentences.sContent_eng: This obviously is the limiting case of the idealized monochromatic wave .
sentences.sCn: 这必然是理想化的单色波的极限波形。

sentences.sContent: Black astrakhan and colorful or monochromatic fox fur collars and lapels are applied to overcoats and jackets.
sentences.sContent_eng: Black astrakhan and colorful or monochromatic fox fur collars and lapels are applied to overcoats and jackets.
sentences.sCn: 黑色俄国羊羔毛和彩色或单色狐狸毛领和翻领应用于大衣和夹克。

sentences.sContent: We determined the influence of adaptive optics correction on through-focus illiterate-E visual acuity and through-focus contrast sensitivity under monochromatic conditions.
sentences.sContent_eng: We determined the influence of adaptive optics correction on through-focus illiterate-E visual acuity and through-focus contrast sensitivity under monochromatic conditions.
sentences.sCn: 我们确定了影响自适应光学校正通过重点文盲娥视力，并通过集中下对比敏感度单色条件。

remMethod.val: mono(单一) + chrom(颜色) + atic → 单色的

trans.tranOther: (of light or other electromagnetic radiation) having only one wavelength
